summary: This function searches for an annotation.
formals: is the type of the annotation.
returns: Return the sought after annotation, if it exists; otherwise, return null.
example-1: @City (%22Montreal%22, %22Toronto%22, %22Vancouver%22)%0Amodule Main in execution;%0A%0Aannotation City;%0A%0A@Start%0Adefun main (args : String[]) : void%0A{%0A    val anno = F::findAnnotation(class Main, class City);%0A%0A    val values = F::iter(anno);%0A%0A    F::printlns(values);%0A}
